DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether an operative hemodynamic optimization using the plethysmographic variability index during orthopedic surgery could decrease the length of hospital stay and the postoperative morbidity.
DOC.brief_title: Operative Hemodynamic Optimization Using the Plethysmographic Variability Index During Orthopedic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years Indication to a knee or hip arthroplasty under general anesthesia Sinusal rhythm Non Pregnant women Black skin Dialysis Cardiac arrythmia Sepsis Use of another hemodynamic monitoring during surgery
